tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_personnel_locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    personnel_id INT,
    coordinate_latitude NUMERIC,
    coordinate_longitude NUMERIC,
    recorded_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE patrols (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patrol_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    personnel_id INT REFERENCES security_personnel_locations(id),
    camera_id INT REFERENCES security_cameras(id),
    patrol_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityPersonnel (
    personnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    designation VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    location_id INT
);
